name: Kitsunebi
description: Kitsunebi helps you browser the internet safer and easier.   Its a fully-featured V2Ray client, supports SOCKS, Shadowsocks and VMess proxy protocols, with TCP/KCP/WebSocket/HTTP(H2)/QUIC as transport protocols.  === Usage === https://github.com/eycorsican/kitsunebi-android  === Bug Report === https://github.com/eycorsican/kitsunebi-android/issues  === iOS Version === https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/kitsunebi-proxy-utility/id1446584073?mt=8
